content:
Prev: Sara gets sent to the dugout to remove her watch Up: Hot Shots vs Spunkee Monkeys Next: Ashley hitting into a fielder's choice

Who's that girl in the red helmet?



We all thought it was Jennifer, or (if we paid a little more attention) that Lindsey had borrowed Jennifer's red helmet, but this helmet is Lindsey's.
Taken Monday, April 26, 2004, 05:13:26pm.  Original image size: 2048x3072, 6.2Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/640s @ F4.0, ISO 200, 70-200mm/F2.8+1.4x @ 235mm (376mm equiv)
PS7 CRW 5000:0, 0.5:10:50:65:0:25:15+M
